summary: Literally some of my fav scenes of the show bc first Anna dies and Villanelle’s like excuse me we interrupt these very troubling...
caption:
Literally some of my fav scenes of the show bc first Anna dies and Villanelle’s like excuse me we interrupt these very troubling tragic happenings but we deserve a BIG lunch so Irina will you go and find some mONEY after checking the situation for a fleeting moment. but then it seems they don’t find enough or any at all so once outside VIllanelle uses Irina to pick pockets multiple times just so they can go to a fancy place, and her satisfaction inspires me for real

Aka. How To Mourn A Loved One: Villanelle Edition.

summary: I’m not sure if u heard but Jodie in a rlly recent interview just confirmed that there is quote “sexual chemistry” in season 2....
question: I’m not sure if u heard but Jodie in a rlly recent interview just confirmed that there is quote “sexual chemistry” in season 2. Do you think that means we are going to get some flirtation or a heated kiss or “devils tango” like that last anon ?
answer:
I DID NOT HEAR THIS. THANK YOU.

Okay. Okay. Now I am sooo hoping that we’re talking about the kind of slow burn that just makes you scream at the tv like:

In all seriousness though, if a huge amount of season 2 wasn’t Eve working out her own feelings for Villanelle, the fandom would riot. I think we’re going to get some more of this push-and-pull that’s been going on in season 1, and—oh lord—I wonder if the show will go as far as the book did, in other words: Eve got off thinking about Villanelle. Yeah, I’m still kind of blown away by that chapter…

Yeah, I’m still kind of blown away by that chapter…

summary: After watching the first episode of Killing Eve all i can think about is the wicked awesome compression bra that Villainelle was...
body:
After watching the first episode of Killing Eve all i can think about is the wicked awesome compression bra that Villainelle was wearing.

Because I want a 5 of them. But sadly the only things I can find are for post surgery so they aren’t cute. Also my boobs are much too big. I’d have better luck with a binder.

summary: Do you think villaneve will do the devils tango? Or maybe just even kiss ?
question: Do you think villaneve will do the devils tango? Or maybe just even kiss ?
answer:
Oh, now we’re talking. Anon, prepare yourself for a long reply!

First off: it’s clear that PWB had the scripts for both books when KE was put together (because Villanelle hides in a suitcase in episode 1, but in the books, it’s not until near the end of the second book). Aka, she knew from the very start how Eve and Villanelle would end up. Now, the stabbing: the equivalent element in the books would be Villanelle almost being blown to pieces, but that wasn’t Eve’s fault. The stabbing, though… yeah, that was all Eve and it pretty much messed up some of the dynamic (even though the fact that it happened still has me in awe and I think it was brilliant).

So, in other words, if we’re going to get a kiss or the devil’s tango, the ”barrier” (the stabbing) has to be demolished. Eve is blind to her own attraction in the first book and, well, in season 1, but I’m fairly certain she’s going to face it in season 2, like she does in book 2. Villanelle’s attraction is no secret in neither the books nor the series, but… knife. Pain. Traitor.

As much as I would like to see my own writing on screen, aka Eve and Villanelle making up and then going at it on the living-room carpet, I know it’s not going to happen. Any devil-stuff between them will have to develop over a longer period of time, so my guess is that since they’re both basically liabilities now, they’re going to team up and try to take down the Big Cunt Carolyn. I think when they do this, they will grow closer, Villanelle will get over Paris, Eve will face her own darkness, and maybe—just maybe—we’ll get the hotness we deserve.

(On a different note: if they do it, and that’s a damn big if, I am going to fucking riot if we don’t actually get to see it. They can show Villanelle literally humping Sebastian into oblivion, but they won’t show Villanelle and Pamela getting it on??? When and if it comes to Villanelle and Eve, they had better.)

summary: (So behind on my write-ups) - Watched all of Trust (the drama based on the true story of the kidnapping of J.Paul Getty III) +...
body:
(So behind on my write-ups) - Watched all of Trust (the drama based on the true story of the kidnapping of J.Paul Getty III) + thought it was excellent esp Donald Sutherland as J. Paul Getty (the grandfather of the boy who got kidnapped). At 1st I wasn’t sure how they were going to keep it going for 10 episodes but I thought they did a great job (altho’ at the end I did think they glossed over a bit what happened to J. Paul Getty III after he was kidnapped)

Also need to mention Killing Eve which I loved + I can’t wait to see what they do for S2. (Tho’ I am a bit sad that they killed off Bill so early on as I thought he was a great character).
